document_data.name: Tower of the Order
document_data.floors: 4The boxed set ''[[City of Splendors (boxed set)|City of Splendors]]'' gives conflicting reports of the Tower's height. The "Campaign Guide" (p. 49) lists it as being four stories tall, while the "Adventurer's Guide to the City" (p. 18) describes it as a three-story tower. ''[[City of Splendors: Waterdeep]]'' (p. 98) describes the Tower as four stories tall, and this article assumes that this later publication is correct.
document_data.services: [[Magic]] items and components for sale, [[arcane]] spellcasters for hire
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the Order''' was the headquarters and seat of the [[Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The Tower was situated in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] on the [[Street of Bells]], near the middle of the block between [[Selduth Street]] and [[Buckle Alley]].
document_data.Description:
Stretching four stories tall, As of the 1360s DR, it was considered the most spectacular guildhall in the Castle Ward. 

The Tower's cellars were heavily guarded by [[golem]]s and magical traps.
document_data.Services: The Watchful Order provided spellcasting for a fee, Members of the Order could purchase spell components and magic items from the Tower's cellars.
